languages.text: {n}Доклад Вигдис внезапно перебивает бойкий голос Идиры.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, Лорд-капитан! Вон оно, здесь, вот здесь где-то! Шепотки-голоски не унимаются, в оба уха шепчут, что дверка моя где-то на этом мире".

{n}Vigdis's report is suddenly interrupted by Idira's anxious voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! This is it, right here, so very close! The quiet whispers — they won't stop! They keep buzzing in both my ears that my little door is somewhere on this world."
languages.original_text: {n}Доклад Вигдис внезапно перебивает бойкий голос Идиры.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, Лорд-капитан! Вон оно, здесь, вот здесь где-то! Шепотки-голоски не унимаются, в оба уха шепчут, что дверка моя где-то на этом мире".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis's report is suddenly interrupted by Idira's brazen voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! This is it, right here, so very close! The quiet voices, the whispers, they will not stop, keep buzzing in both of my ears that my little door is somewhere on this world."

{n}Vigdis's report is suddenly interrupted by Idira's brazen voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! This is it, right here, so very close! The quiet voices, the whispers, they will not stop, keep buzzing in both of my ears that my little door is somewhere on this world."

{n}Vigdis's report is suddenly interrupted by Idira's brazen voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! This is it, right here, so very close! The quiet whispers — they won't stop! They keep buzzing in both my ears that my little door is somewhere in this world."

{n}Vigdis's report is suddenly interrupted by Idira's brazen voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! This is it, right here, so very close! The quiet whispers — they won't stop! They keep buzzing in both my ears that my little door is somewhere in this world."

{n}Vigdis's report is suddenly interrupted by Idira's anxious voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! This is it, right here, so very close! The quiet whispers — they won't stop! They keep buzzing in both my ears that my little door is somewhere on this world."

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯的报告突然被伊迪拉焦虑的声音打断了。{/n}“舰长大人，舰长大人！就是这里，就在这里，非常接近了！那些安静的低语——它们一直在说话！一直在我耳边嗡嗡作响，说我的小门就在这个世界的某个地方。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's report is suddenly interrupted by Idira's anxious voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! This is it, right here, so very close! The quiet whispers — they won't stop! They keep buzzing in both my ears that my little door is somewhere on this world."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯的报告突然被伊迪拉焦虑的声音打断了。{/n}“舰长大人，舰长大人！就是这里，就在这里，非常接近了！那些安静的低语——它们一直在说话！一直在我耳边嗡嗡作响，说我的小门就在这个世界的某个地方。”

languages.text: {n}Le rapport de Vigdis est soudain interrompu par la voix inquiète d'Idira.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine, seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine, seigneure-capitaine} ! C'est ici, tout près ! Les murmures... ils n'arrêtent pas ! Ils me soufflent à l'oreille que ma petite porte se trouve quelque part sur ce monde. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's report is suddenly interrupted by Idira's anxious voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! This is it, right here, so very close! The quiet whispers — they won't stop! They keep buzzing in both my ears that my little door is somewhere on this world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rapport de Vigdis est soudain interrompu par la voix inquiète d'Idira.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine, seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine, seigneure-capitaine} ! C'est ici, tout près ! Les murmures... ils n'arrêtent pas ! Ils me soufflent à l'oreille que ma petite porte se trouve quelque part sur ce monde. »

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich wird Vigdis' Bericht von Idiras ängstlicher Stimme unterbrochen.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! Sie ist hier, ganz nah! Das leise Flüstern – es hört einfach nicht auf! Es schwirrt mir durch die Ohren, dass mein kleines Tor irgendwo auf dieser Welt ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's report is suddenly interrupted by Idira's anxious voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! This is it, right here, so very close! The quiet whispers — they won't stop! They keep buzzing in both my ears that my little door is somewhere on this world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich wird Vigdis' Bericht von Idiras ängstlicher Stimme unterbrochen.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! Sie ist hier, ganz nah! Das leise Flüstern – es hört einfach nicht auf! Es schwirrt mir durch die Ohren, dass mein kleines Tor irgendwo auf dieser Welt ist."

{n}Plötzlich wird Vigdis' Bericht von Idiras unverschämt klingender Stimme unterbrochen.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! Sie ist hier, ganz nah! Das leise Flüstern – es hört einfach nicht auf! Es schwirrt mir durch die Ohren, dass mein kleines Tor irgendwo auf dieser Welt ist."

languages.text: {n}De pronto, la ansiosa voz de Idira interrumpe el informe de Vigdis.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán, Lord Capitán! ¡Es aquí, estamos muy cerca! ¡Los susurros, los oigo! Me dicen que mi pequeña puerta está en algún lugar de este mundo».
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's report is suddenly interrupted by Idira's anxious voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! This is it, right here, so very close! The quiet whispers — they won't stop! They keep buzzing in both my ears that my little door is somewhere on this world."

traits.locale_text: {n}De pronto, la ansiosa voz de Idira interrumpe el informe de Vigdis.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán, Lord Capitán! ¡Es aquí, estamos muy cerca! ¡Los susurros, los oigo! Me dicen que mi pequeña puerta está en algún lugar de este mundo».

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスの報告は、突然イディラの不安げな声に遮られる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、ロード・キャプテン！ここよ、ここ！すぐそばなの！静かなささやきが止まらないの！あたいの小さな扉がこの世界のどこかにあるって、両耳でずっとざわめいてるの！」
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's report is suddenly interrupted by Idira's anxious voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! This is it, right here, so very close! The quiet whispers — they won't stop! They keep buzzing in both my ears that my little door is somewhere on this world."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスの報告は、突然イディラの不安げな声に遮られる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、ロード・キャプテン！ここよ、ここ！すぐそばなの！静かなささやきが止まらないの！あたいの小さな扉がこの世界のどこかにあるって、両耳でずっとざわめいてるの！」

languages.text: {n}Vigdis'in raporu, İdira'nın endişeli sözleriyle yarıda kalıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, Lord Kaptan! Bakın, çok yaklaştık! Kısık sesli fısıltılar durmak bilmiyor! İki kulağıma birden fısıldayıp duruyorlar. Diyorlar ki benim küçük kapım bu dünyada bir yerdeymiş."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis's report is suddenly interrupted by Idira's anxious voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, Lord Captain! This is it, right here, so very close! The quiet whispers — they won't stop! They keep buzzing in both my ears that my little door is somewhere on this world."
